{id:'w001',english:'ability',chinese:'能力，才能',pronunciation:'/əˈbɪləti/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['He has the ability to solve problems.'],tags:['基础','常用']},{id:'w002',english:'absent',chinese:'缺席的，不在的',pronunciation:'/ˈæbsənt/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['She was absent from school yesterday.'],tags:['基础','形容词']},{id:'w003',english:'absolute',chinese:'绝对的，完全的',pronunciation:'/ˈæbsəluːt/',difficulty:3,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['That is absolute nonsense.'],tags:['基础','形容词']},{id:'w004',english:'accept',chinese:'接受，同意',pronunciation:'/əkˈsept/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['I accept your apology.'],tags:['基础','动词']},{id:'w005',english:'accident',chinese:'事故，意外',pronunciation:'/ˈæksɪdənt/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['There was a car accident on the highway.'],tags:['基础','名词']},{id:'w006',english:'achieve',chinese:'达到，实现',pronunciation:'/əˈtʃiːv/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['She achieved her goal of becoming a doctor.'],tags:['基础','动词']},{id:'w007',english:'action',chinese:'行动，行为',pronunciation:'/ˈækʃn/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['We need to take action now.'],tags:['基础','名词']},{id:'w008',english:'active',chinese:'积极的，活跃的',pronunciation:'/ˈæktɪv/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['He is very active in sports.'],tags:['基础','形容词']},{id:'w009',english:'address',chinese:'地址，演讲',pronunciation:'/əˈdres/',difficulty:2,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['What is your home address?'],tags:['基础','名词']},{id:'w010',english:'advantage',chinese:'优势，好处',pronunciation:'/ədˈvɑːntɪdʒ/',difficulty:3,chapter:'基础核心词汇',examples:['This plan has many advantages.'],tags:['基础','名词']},// 第二章：学习与教育词汇
{id:'w011',english:'education',chinese:'教育',pronunciation:'/ˌedʒuˈkeɪʃn/',difficulty:2,chapter:'学习与教育',examples:['Education is very important.'],tags:['教育','名词']},{id:'w012',english:'knowledge',chinese:'知识',pronunciation:'/ˈnɑːlɪdʒ/',difficulty:2,chapter:'学习与教育',examples:['Knowledge is power.'],tags:['教育','名词']},{id:'w013',english:'student',chinese:'学生',pronunciation:'/ˈstuːdnt/',difficulty:1,chapter:'学习与教育',examples:['She is a good student.'],tags:['教育','名词']},{id:'w014',english:'teacher',chinese:'老师',pronunciation:'/ˈtiːtʃər/',difficulty:1,chapter:'学习与教育',examples:['My teacher is very kind.'],tags:['教育','名词']},{id:'w015',english:'university',chinese:'大学',pronunciation:'/ˌjuːnɪˈvɜːrsəti/',difficulty:2,chapter:'学习与教育',examples:['I want to go to university.'],tags:['教育','名词']},// 第三章：科技与现代生活
{id:'w016',english:'technology',chinese:'技术，科技',pronunciation:'/tekˈnɑːlədʒi/',difficulty:3,chapter:'科技与现代生活',examples:['Technology changes our lives.'],tags:['科技','名词']},{id:'w017',english:'computer',chinese:'计算机',pronunciation:'/kəmˈpjuːtər/',difficulty:2,chapter:'科技与现代生活',examples:['I use a computer every day.'],tags:['科技','名词']},{id:'w018',english:'internet',chinese:'互联网',pronunciation:'/ˈɪntərnet/',difficulty:2,chapter:'科技与现代生活',examples:['The internet connects the world.'],tags:['科技','名词']},{id:'w019',english:'communication',chinese:'交流，通信',pronunciation:'/kəˌmjuːnɪˈkeɪʃn/',difficulty:3,chapter:'科技与现代生活',examples:['Good communication is important.'],tags:['科技','名词']},{id:'w020',english:'information',chinese:'信息',pronunciation:'/ˌɪnfərˈmeɪʃn/',difficulty:2,chapter:'科技与现代生活',examples:['We need more information.'],tags:['科技','名词']},// 第四章：环境与自然
{id:'w021',english:'environment',chinese:'环境',pronunciation:'/ɪnˈvaɪrənmənt/',difficulty:3,chapter:'环境与自然',examples:['We must protect the environment.'],tags:['环境','名词']},{id:'w022',english:'nature',chinese:'自然',pronunciation:'/ˈneɪtʃər/',difficulty:2,chapter:'环境与自然',examples:['I love nature.'],tags:['环境','名词']},{id:'w023',english:'pollution',chinese:'污染',pronunciation:'/pəˈluːʃn/',difficulty:3,chapter:'环境与自然',examples:['Air pollution is a serious problem.'],tags:['环境','名词']},{id:'w024',english:'climate',chinese:'气候',pronunciation:'/ˈklaɪmət/',difficulty:3,chapter:'环境与自然',examples:['Climate change affects everyone.'],tags:['环境','名词']},{id:'w025',english:'energy',chinese:'能源，精力',pronunciation:'/ˈenərdʒi/',difficulty:2,chapter:'环境与自然',examples:['Solar energy is renewable.'],tags:['环境','名词']},// 第五章：社会与文化
{id:'w026',english:'society',chinese:'社会',pronunciation:'/səˈsaɪəti/',difficulty:3,chapter:'社会与文化',examples:['We live in a modern society.'],tags:['社会','名词']},{id:'w027',english:'culture',chinese:'文化',pronunciation:'/ˈkʌltʃər/',difficulty:2,chapter:'社会与文化',examples:['Chinese culture is very rich.'],tags:['社会','名词']},{id:'w028',english:'tradition',chinese:'传统',pronunciation:'/trəˈdɪʃn/',difficulty:3,chapter:'社会与文化',examples:['This is a Chinese tradition.'],tags:['社会','名词']},{id:'w029',english:'community',chinese:'社区，社会',pronunciation:'/kəˈmjuːnəti/',difficulty:3,chapter:'社会与文化',examples:['Our community is very friendly.'],tags:['社会','名词']},{id:'w030',english:'opportunity',chinese:'机会',pronunciation:'/ˌɑːpərˈtuːnəti/',difficulty:3,chapter:'社会与文化',examples:['This is a great opportunity.'],tags:['社会','名词']}];// 按章节分组的词汇
export const wordsByChapter={'基础核心词汇':highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.chapter==='基础核心词汇'),'学习与教育':highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.chapter==='学习与教育'),'科技与现代生活':highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.chapter==='科技与现代生活'),'环境与自然':highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.chapter==='环境与自然'),'社会与文化':highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.chapter==='社会与文化')};// 按难度分组的词汇
export const wordsByDifficulty={easy:highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.difficulty<=2),medium:highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.difficulty===3),hard:highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.difficulty>=4)};// 获取随机单词
export const getRandomWords=function(count){let excludeIds=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:[];const availableWords=highSchoolWords.filter(word=>!excludeIds.includes(word.id));const shuffled=[...availableWords].sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5);return shuffled.slice(0,count);};// 获取错误选项
export const getWrongOptions=function(correctWord){let count=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:3;const otherWords=highSchoolWords.filter(word=>word.id!==correctWord.id&&word.chinese!==correctWord.chinese);const shuffled=[...otherWords].sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5);return shuffled.slice(0,count).map(word=>word.chinese);};

sourcesContent:
import { Word } from '../types/word';

export const highSchoolWords: Word[] = [
  // 第一章：基础核心词汇
  {
    id: 'w001',
    english: 'ability',
    chinese: '能力，才能',
    pronunciation: '/əˈbɪləti/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['He has the ability to solve problems.'],
    tags: ['基础', '常用']
  },
  {
    id: 'w002',
    english: 'absent',
    chinese: '缺席的，不在的',
    pronunciation: '/ˈæbsənt/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['She was absent from school yesterday.'],
    tags: ['基础', '形容词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w003',
    english: 'absolute',
    chinese: '绝对的，完全的',
    pronunciation: '/ˈæbsəluːt/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['That is absolute nonsense.'],
    tags: ['基础', '形容词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w004',
    english: 'accept',
    chinese: '接受，同意',
    pronunciation: '/əkˈsept/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['I accept your apology.'],
    tags: ['基础', '动词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w005',
    english: 'accident',
    chinese: '事故，意外',
    pronunciation: '/ˈæksɪdənt/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['There was a car accident on the highway.'],
    tags: ['基础', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w006',
    english: 'achieve',
    chinese: '达到，实现',
    pronunciation: '/əˈtʃiːv/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['She achieved her goal of becoming a doctor.'],
    tags: ['基础', '动词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w007',
    english: 'action',
    chinese: '行动，行为',
    pronunciation: '/ˈækʃn/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['We need to take action now.'],
    tags: ['基础', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w008',
    english: 'active',
    chinese: '积极的，活跃的',
    pronunciation: '/ˈæktɪv/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['He is very active in sports.'],
    tags: ['基础', '形容词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w009',
    english: 'address',
    chinese: '地址，演讲',
    pronunciation: '/əˈdres/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['What is your home address?'],
    tags: ['基础', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w010',
    english: 'advantage',
    chinese: '优势，好处',
    pronunciation: '/ədˈvɑːntɪdʒ/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '基础核心词汇',
    examples: ['This plan has many advantages.'],
    tags: ['基础', '名词']
  },

  // 第二章：学习与教育词汇
  {
    id: 'w011',
    english: 'education',
    chinese: '教育',
    pronunciation: '/ˌedʒuˈkeɪʃn/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '学习与教育',
    examples: ['Education is very important.'],
    tags: ['教育', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w012',
    english: 'knowledge',
    chinese: '知识',
    pronunciation: '/ˈnɑːlɪdʒ/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '学习与教育',
    examples: ['Knowledge is power.'],
    tags: ['教育', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w013',
    english: 'student',
    chinese: '学生',
    pronunciation: '/ˈstuːdnt/',
    difficulty: 1,
    chapter: '学习与教育',
    examples: ['She is a good student.'],
    tags: ['教育', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w014',
    english: 'teacher',
    chinese: '老师',
    pronunciation: '/ˈtiːtʃər/',
    difficulty: 1,
    chapter: '学习与教育',
    examples: ['My teacher is very kind.'],
    tags: ['教育', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w015',
    english: 'university',
    chinese: '大学',
    pronunciation: '/ˌjuːnɪˈvɜːrsəti/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '学习与教育',
    examples: ['I want to go to university.'],
    tags: ['教育', '名词']
  },

  // 第三章：科技与现代生活
  {
    id: 'w016',
    english: 'technology',
    chinese: '技术，科技',
    pronunciation: '/tekˈnɑːlədʒi/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '科技与现代生活',
    examples: ['Technology changes our lives.'],
    tags: ['科技', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w017',
    english: 'computer',
    chinese: '计算机',
    pronunciation: '/kəmˈpjuːtər/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '科技与现代生活',
    examples: ['I use a computer every day.'],
    tags: ['科技', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w018',
    english: 'internet',
    chinese: '互联网',
    pronunciation: '/ˈɪntərnet/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '科技与现代生活',
    examples: ['The internet connects the world.'],
    tags: ['科技', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w019',
    english: 'communication',
    chinese: '交流，通信',
    pronunciation: '/kəˌmjuːnɪˈkeɪʃn/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '科技与现代生活',
    examples: ['Good communication is important.'],
    tags: ['科技', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w020',
    english: 'information',
    chinese: '信息',
    pronunciation: '/ˌɪnfərˈmeɪʃn/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '科技与现代生活',
    examples: ['We need more information.'],
    tags: ['科技', '名词']
  },

  // 第四章：环境与自然
  {
    id: 'w021',
    english: 'environment',
    chinese: '环境',
    pronunciation: '/ɪnˈvaɪrənmənt/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '环境与自然',
    examples: ['We must protect the environment.'],
    tags: ['环境', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w022',
    english: 'nature',
    chinese: '自然',
    pronunciation: '/ˈneɪtʃər/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '环境与自然',
    examples: ['I love nature.'],
    tags: ['环境', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w023',
    english: 'pollution',
    chinese: '污染',
    pronunciation: '/pəˈluːʃn/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '环境与自然',
    examples: ['Air pollution is a serious problem.'],
    tags: ['环境', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w024',
    english: 'climate',
    chinese: '气候',
    pronunciation: '/ˈklaɪmət/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '环境与自然',
    examples: ['Climate change affects everyone.'],
    tags: ['环境', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w025',
    english: 'energy',
    chinese: '能源，精力',
    pronunciation: '/ˈenərdʒi/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '环境与自然',
    examples: ['Solar energy is renewable.'],
    tags: ['环境', '名词']
  },

  // 第五章：社会与文化
  {
    id: 'w026',
    english: 'society',
    chinese: '社会',
    pronunciation: '/səˈsaɪəti/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '社会与文化',
    examples: ['We live in a modern society.'],
    tags: ['社会', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w027',
    english: 'culture',
    chinese: '文化',
    pronunciation: '/ˈkʌltʃər/',
    difficulty: 2,
    chapter: '社会与文化',
    examples: ['Chinese culture is very rich.'],
    tags: ['社会', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w028',
    english: 'tradition',
    chinese: '传统',
    pronunciation: '/trəˈdɪʃn/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '社会与文化',
    examples: ['This is a Chinese tradition.'],
    tags: ['社会', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w029',
    english: 'community',
    chinese: '社区，社会',
    pronunciation: '/kəˈmjuːnəti/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '社会与文化',
    examples: ['Our community is very friendly.'],
    tags: ['社会', '名词']
  },
  {
    id: 'w030',
    english: 'opportunity',
    chinese: '机会',
    pronunciation: '/ˌɑːpərˈtuːnəti/',
    difficulty: 3,
    chapter: '社会与文化',
    examples: ['This is a great opportunity.'],
    tags: ['社会', '名词']
  }
];

// 按章节分组的词汇
export const wordsByChapter: Record<string, Word[]> = {
  '基础核心词汇': highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.chapter === '基础核心词汇'),
  '学习与教育': highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.chapter === '学习与教育'),
  '科技与现代生活': highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.chapter === '科技与现代生活'),
  '环境与自然': highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.chapter === '环境与自然'),
  '社会与文化': highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.chapter === '社会与文化'),
};

// 按难度分组的词汇
export const wordsByDifficulty = {
  easy: highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.difficulty <= 2),
  medium: highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.difficulty === 3),
  hard: highSchoolWords.filter(word => word.difficulty >= 4),
};

// 获取随机单词
export const getRandomWords = (count: number, excludeIds: string[] = []): Word[] => {
  const availableWords = highSchoolWords.filter(word => !excludeIds.includes(word.id));
  const shuffled = [...availableWords].sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
  return shuffled.slice(0, count);
};

// 获取错误选项
export const getWrongOptions = (correctWord: Word, count: number = 3): string[] => {
  const otherWords = highSchoolWords.filter(word => 
    word.id !== correctWord.id && 
    word.chinese !== correctWord.chinese
  );
  const shuffled = [...otherWords].sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5);
  return shuffled.slice(0, count).map(word => word.chinese);
};
